Name: Dangerous platform
About the game: 'Dangerous platform' is a classic 2D platformer. Player has a simple task - collect all the coins to proceed to the next level. Coins are scattered throughout the level, where dangerous traps are waiting the player. The coins are often in places difficult to get to. It will take a lot of dexterity to jump higher! Push off the walls, use ropes to reach your goal. At some levels, you need to think which way to go first, otherwise there will be no way back. This is the only way you can win. Game features: Beautiful graphics Dynamic gameplay Steam Achievements support Challenging levels[/lst] Try to beat the game! Good luck!
